MainWindow¶

This file is the run.py that makes the application run

class lsystem.__main__.MyMainWindow(parent=None)¶

This class is the main UI Window that is the parent for the entire application

Makes sure everything gets properly deleated upon closing

Shows the main window

Settings¶

This file handles the popup settings window

class lsystem.core.settings.PopupSettings(graphix)¶

This is the window for the popup settings

add_widgets()¶

Adds the widgets to the settings layout

dim_state(dim)¶

Sets the dimension state when changed

init_UI()¶

Makes the UI for the settings menu

init_buttons()¶

Initializes the buttons and button states in the settings menu

UI¶

This file adds the graphics to the UI F(and G) draws a unit length line f(and g) moves forward a unit length H draws a half length line h moves forward half a unit length - turns counter-clockwise + turns clockwise [ starts branch ] ends branch | reverses direction ( decrements the angle by a turning angle ) increments the angle by a turning angle

class lsystem.core.my_ui.CustomLineEdit¶

Class that enables clicking in a text box

class lsystem.core.my_ui.UIWidget¶

Class that holds all of the widgets for viewing

add_widgets()¶
close_event()¶
gen_example(example)¶
gen_rule_dict(prod_rules)¶

formats production rules as {“F”: [[p,rule],[p,rule]], “f”:[[p,rule],[p,rule]] … }

gen_sys()¶

If the input is valid, iterates through productions and sends to graphics to be drawn

init_UI()¶

Creates and adds all widgets in the viewport and sets the layout

init_buttons()¶
init_text_boxes()¶

Links all of the text boxes to buttons

less_prods()¶

Removes productions when - button is clicked

more_prods()¶

Creates more productions when + button is clicked

Save Rules¶

This file handles the saving of rules

Makes the window that allows the user to save rules

add_widgets()¶

Adds the widgets to the layout

sets the window title, layout, and adds widgets to the window

save()¶

Saves the json file with the lsystem in it
